Package presentation

package presentation
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AllView
    AllView is the GUI Class that is used to see the products or clients in a JTable.
    ClientBoxView
    ClientBoxView is used to get the information for the clients that are to be added, removed or updated.
    ClientView
    ClientView is the GUI Window set for configuring the clients in the database, as having buttons for adding, removing, updating or viewing all clients
    Controller
    The controller manages the GUI windows and retrieves/gives the necessary data from the GUI and to the business logic objects.
    OrderView
    OrderView represents the GUI interface that is used to create an order, having the user input the id of the product, the client and the quantity desired
    ProductBoxView
    ProductBoxView is used to get the information for the products that are to be added, removed or updated.
    ProductView
    ProductView is the GUI Window set for configuring the products in the database, as having buttons for adding, removing, updating or viewing all products
    StartView
